The limited edition is different from the standard edition, by including extra serial code to download the limited items from EA site. So for a torrent, both versions are the same. You will need to find these limited items elsewhere. 

For this expansion, there are three extra sims3pack files to be downloaded from EA site, or elsewhere: 
(1)the registration set "EP7RegSET.sims3pack" ~7MB
(2) the Origin set  "EP7OriginSET.sims3pack" ~1.5MB
(3) the Limited set "EP7LimitedEditionSET.sims3pack" ~82MB
Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!!!! It WORKS!!! I'm SO excited!!

IF YOU’RE HAVING THE STARTUP ERROR “Service initialization failed (0x0175dcbb)”

HOW TO FIX:

1. Push Start
2. In Search Box type regedit and push ENTER
3. Open HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE Folder
4. Open SOFTWARE Folder
5. Find “Sims” Folder
6. Right Click and push Delete
7. REINSTALL SIMS COMPLETELY

IF “Sims” is not there, check under a Folder that starts with “Wow” it should be under there.

1. First of all you need the BASE game "The Sims 3"

2. If you have a MOD items or MOD programs, remove them before installing a Sims 3 expansion pack or stuff pack.

3. turn off your internet when installing a Sims 3 expansion pack or stuff pack.

4. DO NOT INSTALL THE ORIGIN! a.k.a Electronic Arts Download Manager (never ever ever ever!)

5. When cracking the Sims 3 w/ expansion and stuff pack installed, always paste the crack in "Sims 3 BASE GAME"

I got every expansion to work without any cracks.. 
just install the base game then update. 
install each expansion(used daemon tools lite) one by one and updating when asked. Then after every expansion is installed, you remove the virtual drive from daemon tools and close daemon tools. then use poweriso and mount a virtual drive with supernatural and start game.  it shouldnt ask for a disk.. if it does then i guess this method doesnt work for u, or u have another fake drive open somewhere.
